articles.author: Brooke Masters
articles.title: BlackRock on hunt for 'transformational' opportunities as assets hit $9.1tn - Financial Times
articles.description: Net income fell 19 per cent year on year to $1.1bn in the first quarter
articles.content: BlackRock is hunting for transformational opportunities created by the recent banking turmoil and market dislocation, chief executive Larry Fink said on Friday as the worlds largest money manager rep… [+3433 chars]
